data.eml:eml: Neorhynchoplax yaeyamaensis, a new false spider crab (Decapoda: Brachyura: Hymenosomatidae) from the Yaeyama Group, the Ryukyu Islands, Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Naruse, Tohru, Shokita, Shigemitsu, Kawahara, Takeshi (2005): Neorhynchoplax yaeyamaensis, a new false spider crab (Decapoda: Brachyura: Hymenosomatidae) from the Yaeyama Group, the Ryukyu Islands, Japan. Zootaxa 877: 1-7, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170894
